name: MongoDB
short_description: NoSQL document database for flexible data storage and management.
description: NoSQL document database for flexible data storage and management. MongoDB is a self-hosted application focused on database, storage, files, utility. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host MongoDB on your home server to nosql document database for flexible data storage and management without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use MongoDB to manage your database workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
